--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Roger Smith <rog_21@y...> wrote:
> Has anyone use NEAT for facial recognition or to
> identify objects?
> 
> -- Rog
> 
> 

Check out Darren Izzard's (known as zysyshelp in this group)
shape recognition code in the Files section.  It's a very interesting
approach to object identification.  He uses an eye that moves over the
picture in question and eventually makes a decision.  It's a good
approach because the eye can have many fewer inputs than there are
pixels in the image.  

Hopefully if Darren is still reading this group he can comment as
well.

ken
